body_html:
Sorry, just had time to look through your code. Please be careful how you do GPU perf timings. You need to synchronize the GPU before starting and before ending your timer.

With the gist link posted below I see:
fp32 6.5e-3 s / iteration
fp16 3.8e-3 s / iteration

This is also a strange set of parameters for a convolution as your image is effectively 1 pixel, and as I think you eluded to, would be fine with fully connected layer. Make sure your gemm timings are correct as well please. I only looked at your convolution code.

https://gist.github.com/csarofeen/feee5eb9308f2aa5a9bf1b678f1fa97e
